materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of Fort Cornwallis in Penang, Malaysia. There is a moat in the photograph, with a bridge on the left. There is a man on the extreme left of the photograph, looking into the distance. On the other side of the moat closer to the sea, there is a roofed building structure. By it, there are a few animals grazing by the grass. The background of the photograph features a mountainous region on the left, and the sea on the right. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Fort Cornwallis, Penang
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Fortification Moats Pulau Pinang (Malaysia : State)
